archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.6.1: Risks identified as part of an information risk assessment should be suitably treated, taking into account: the organisation's risk appetite; any security or compliance requirements; the type and severity of risk to the target environment; and the cost of different risk treatment options.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
